titleStmt.title: The hammer for the stone so named, for that it sheweth the most excellent remedie that euer was knowne for the same. Latelie deuised by Walter Carie Maister of Art, and student in physicke.
titleStmt.author: Cary, Walter.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henrie Denham dwelling in Pater noster Row at the signe of the Starre,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
